posts.post_content:
Up for sale are six T206's that I picked up because they all had nice centering and colors.

Prices include delivery:

Brashear, Roy ~ Piedmont ~ SGC 50 $SOLD
Doolan, Mickey ~ SC ~ (Batting) PSA 4.5 $SOLD
Evans, Steve ~ SC ~ SGC 20 $SOLD (Paper Loss on Back)
Kisinger, Rube ~ Piedmont ~ SGC 40 $SOLD


Doyle, Larry ~ Old Mill ~ (With Bat) SGC 40 $SOLD
Murray, Red ~ Polar Bear ~ (Portrait) SGC 30 $36.00

Red Murray Portrait ~ SGC30 ~ $36.00

[URL=http://smg.photobucket.com/user/bunker9603/media/Top-004bmp-7.jpg.html][IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v498/bunker9603/Top-004bmp-7.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://smg.photobucket.com/user/bunker9603/media/Top-006bmp-5.jpg.html][IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v498/bunker9603/Top-006bmp-5.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Steve Evans ~ SGC 20 ~ $SOLD ~ Paper loss on the back:

Really nice corners, decent centering and great color...it is a shame about the loss of paper on the back :(

[URL=http://smg.photobucket.com/user/bunker9603/media/Topbmp-16.jpg.html][IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v498/bunker9603/Topbmp-16.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://smg.photobucket.com/user/bunker9603/media/Top-002bmp-7.jpg.html][IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v498/bunker9603/Top-002bmp-7.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
The Evans is "Pending" and the Murray has been reduced to $36 delivered.
